meanings: [명사] concern, worry, fear, [동사] be concerned, worry (about), fear (that)

vlive.korean: 분실 우려도 없고 - 분실 우려? They won't get lost. - Getting lost? 듣기 View video NU'EST : 뉴이스트와 스푼즈가 함께하는 Special V LIVE [THE NU'STORE]
vlive.english: They won't get lost. - Getting lost?

vlive.korean: [우려했던 일이 현실로 일어났습니다] '연준이가' 누구야? [What they worried became reality] Who wrote this? 듣기 View video TOMORROW X TOGETHER : TO DO X TOMORROW X TOGETHER 2020 - EP.1
vlive.english: [What they worried became reality] Who wrote this?

vlive.korean: 육수를 우려야 되나? Should we make broth now? 듣기 View video Stray Kids : 막내의 사생활5 (Feat.새해 복 많이 받으세요)
너무 우려하지 마세요. Don't push yourself too hard. 듣기 View video NU'EST : [NU'EST W] 막내 왓처 쩨아리와 함께하는 러브캐처 본방사수 준비📺

vlive.english: Because it might to too rich or heavy for our skin.

examples.korean: His speech dispelled any fears about his health. 발음듣기 그의 연설은 그의 건강에 대한 모든 우려를 없앴다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: His speech dispelled any fears about his health. 발음

examples.korean: There is growing apprehension that fighting will begin again. 발음듣기 전투가 다시 시작될 것이라는 우려가 커지고 있다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: There is growing apprehension that fighting will begin again. 발음

examples.korean: The latest figures should neutralize the fears of inflation. 발음듣기 최근의 수치들이 인플레이션 우려를 불식시킬 것이다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: The latest figures should neutralize the fears of inflation. 발음

examples.korean: People fear that security cameras could infringe personal liberties. 발음듣기 사람들은 보안 카메라가 개인의 자유를 침해할 수도 있다고 우려한다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: People fear that security cameras could infringe personal liberties. 발음

examples.korean: the alarming frequency of computer errors 발음듣기 우려스러울 정도로 빈발하는 컴퓨터 오류 Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: the alarming frequency of computer errors 발음
